attributes.action: allow the Police to prosecute MPs in the Expenses Row
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any member of the tax paying public caught doing this kind of criminal action would be taken in for questioning and charged, why should the MPs be above the law. If they did nothing wrong then why are they apologising and paying back the money?
They are quilty and should pay the penalty through courts as we would if it was us.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
